title: Fairbuds XL: ANC headphones just got a lot more repairable
description: Fairphone, a tech company committed to sustainability, released a 100% modular pair of over-ear ANC headphones.

title: How to use Reader View mode in Firefox (and when you should)
description: If you're having trouble viewing articles and posts on the websites you enjoy, it may be time to start using Firefox Reader View mode.

title: How to enable automatic touchpad clicks on Chrome OS (and why you might need this)
description: ChromeOS has a handy feature that makes it easier to click on an item from the trackpad, without having to actually tap or click.

title: Google to expand Dark Web monitoring to all Gmail users in the U.S.
description: Currently available only to Google One subscribers, the option will soon help all Gmail users learn if their email address is discovered on the dark web.

title: I wish my iPad had this game-changing Pixel Tablet feature
description: It didn't get a lot of stage time at I/O, but this one feature made the Pixel Tablet super appealing.

title: Google Bard is now running on PaLM 2 -- or is it?
description: After a long-awaited upgrade, Bard seems to be holding on to some of its old quirks, even denying its upgrade to PaLM 2.

title: Google Pixel Tablet vs OnePlus Pad: The battle of the $500 tablets
description: Which mid-range tablet is right for you? We'll help you decide based on your specific needs.

title: How to add local music files to Spotify on Android
description: If Spotify is your choice for music listening on the go and you have audio files that are unavailable on the service, you can easily add them. Here's how.

title: New Google search tool will distinguish real images from AI-generated phonies
description: Rolling out in the coming months, the new 'About this Image' tool will help identify which images in a search are real and which are created by AI.

title: RIP, webcams: Google's Project Starline is a remote worker's dream machine
description: The tech giant unveiled the latest prototype for its AI-powered videoconferencing system, which is considerably smaller and simpler, and quite possibly the hero remote workers need right now.

title: Small developers are crushing it on Apple's App Store with 71% growth in two years
description: Small developers can access a number of tools and resources from Apple. Here's how those tools are helping developers to become successful.

title: This data platform will help banks share criminal intelligence
description: Singapore is developing a digital platform to enable six major banks, including Citibank and Standard Chartered, to exchange data on customers involved in potentially illegal financial activities.

title: Red Hat advances with new Enterprise Linux releases
description: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9.2 is out, and RHEL 8.8 will follow shortly.
